name: The Magician Go!
description:
The Magician Go is a turned based strategy game in which the player must defeat as many evil mages as they can. 

Controls:

Spacebar - Change Dialogue

Attack - Deal damage to the evil mage

Defend -  Protect your self from the evil mage's attack

Skill - Deals extra damage. Available to use after defending

To restart the game, refresh the page!

/!\ This is a development concept build/!\

Game Designer: Rocco Wu

Programmer: Rocco Wu

Visual Artist: Nico Bellomo
